import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import authContext from '../../context/auth/authContext'; const Navbar = () => { const [isExpanded, toggleExpansion] = useState(false); const { isAuthenticated, logout, user } = authContext; const onLogout = () => logout; return (
ABL
toggleExpansion(!isExpanded)} > Home toggleExpansion(!isExpanded)} > About toggleExpansion(!isExpanded)} > Login
Logout {isAuthenticated ? user.name : ''}
); }; export default Navbar;
